00021 class BTreeFileException : public IZENELIBException
00022 {
00023 public:
00024     enum MyErrorCode
00025     {
00026         EC_BADPARAM,               
00027         NUM_ERRORS,                 
00028         KEY_MISMATCH
00029     };
00030 
00031     BTreeFileException(MyErrorCode ec, string d="")
00032     {
00033         string ss = my_errorstring[ec];
00034         detail = ss+":"+d;
00035     }
00036     ~BTreeFileException() throw() {}
00037 
00038     const char* what() const throw ()
00039     {
00040         string ret = BaseException::what();
00041         if (boost::shared_ptr<const string>   badparamname = boost::get_error_info<badparamname_info>(*this) )
00042         {
00043             std::stringstream out;
00044             out << *badparamname;
00045             ret += out.str();
00046         }
00047 
00048         if (boost::shared_ptr<const string>   badparam = boost::get_error_info<badparamvalue_info>(*this) )
00049         {
00050             std::stringstream out;
00051             out << *badparam;
00052             ret += out.str();
00053         }
00054         return ret.c_str();
00055     }
00056 
00057 private:
00058     static const char* my_errorstring[EC_NOERROR];
00059 };
00060 
00061 const char* BTreeFileException::ece_errorstring[EC_NOERROR] =
00062 {
00063     "Missing parameter",                //MISSING_PARAMETER_ERROR
00064         "Num_error",
00065         "Key, mismatch"
00066 };
